explains: adj. 专横的；迫切的；傲慢的

sentences.en: Mary asked, still in her imperious little Indian way.
sentences.cn: 玛丽问道，仍然是那种专横的印第安人的口气。

sentences.en: She was imperious and Indian, and at the same time hot and sorrowful.
sentences.cn: 她像在印度时一样专横，同时又有点激动和难过。

sentences.en: Her attitude is imperious at times.
